alert.note: Alert for Powell (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 1:20PM MDT until June 18 at 1:45PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Powell County in west central Montana... * Until 145 PM MDT. * At 119 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Garrison, or 19 miles north of Deer Lodge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Finn and Avon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
